analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buy (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#279-336):
	External calls:
	- _amount = crowdsaleBonus(msg.value.div(price) * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#283-285)
	- token.delivery(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#304)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _referrer.transfer(toReferrer) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#293-294)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalEth (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#304-306)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buy (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#279-336):

	External calls sending eth:

	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.bountyTransfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#485-495):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(bounty >= amount && token.currentBalance() >= amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#487-489)
	- token.delivery(_to,amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#489-490)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bounty (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#490-491)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.swap (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#532-544):
	External calls:
	- ercToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)
	- token.delivery(msg.sender,ath) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bounty (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)

Crowdsale.buy (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#279-336) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.delivery(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#304)

Crowdsale.completeIcoPart1 (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#408-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.delivery(owners[i],bounty.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#422-423)
	-token.delivery(owners[i],tmp.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#429-432)
	-token.afterIco(redemptionPriceCalculate(sales)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#437)

Crowdsale.bountyTransfer (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#485-495) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.delivery(_to,amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#489-490)

Crowdsale.swap (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#532-544) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ercToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)
	-ercToken.transfer(owners[i],_amount.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)
	-token.delivery(msg.sender,ath) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)

Crowdsale.buy has external calls inside a loop:
	- owners[i].transfer((msg.value.sub(toReferrer)).div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#315-317)

Crowdsale.completeIcoPart1 has external calls inside a loop:
	- owners[i].transfer(b.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#436)

Crowdsale.completeIcoPart1 has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.delivery(owners[i],bounty.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#422-423)

Crowdsale.completeIcoPart1 has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.delivery(owners[i],tmp.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol#429-432)

Crowdsale.swap has external calls inside a loop:
	- ercToken.transfer(owners[i],_amount.div(owners.length)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x3aa2d543a49efcbb24607f834358df3561222a05.sol)
